title: Rockabye (feat. Sean Paul & Anne-Marie)
author: Clean Bandit
lyrics:
[00:00.86] Call it love and devotion
[00:03.24] Call it a mom's adoration (foundation)
[00:06.06] A special bond of creation, hah
[00:09.68] For all the single moms out there, going through frustration
[00:13.68] Clean Bandit, Sean-da-Paul, Anne-Marie
[00:16.25] Sing, make them hear
[00:17.68] She works at nights, by the water
[00:21.98] She's gone astray, so far away
[00:24.69] From her father's daughter
[00:27.04] She just wants a life for her baby
[00:31.53] All on her own, no one will come
[00:34.58] She's got to save him (daily struggle)
[00:36.97] She tells him, "Ooh, love, no one's ever gonna hurt you, love"
[00:40.83] "I'm gonna give you all of my love"
[00:43.38] "Nobody matters like you" (stay up there, stay up there)
[00:46.53] She tells him, "Your life ain't gon' be nothing like my life" (straight!)
[00:50.67] "You're gonna grow and have a good life"
